src:
Data dan Fakta Liga Champions: Borussia Dortmund vs Inter Milan
04 Nov 2019, 16:17 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Borussia Dortmund akan menjamu Inter Milan pada matchday 4 Grup F Liga Champions 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019). Berikut beberapa data dan fakta yang melatarbelakangi pertandingan di Signal Iduna Park ini.
Pada matchday 3, Dortmund menyerah 0-2 di markas Inter. Gol-gol Inter dicetak Lautaro Martinez menit 22 dan Antonio Candreva menit 89.
Inter serta Dortmund saat ini sama-sama memiliki 4 poin, tertinggal 3 poin di belakang Barcelona (7) dan unggul 3 poin atas Slavia Praha (1).
Matchday 1: Inter Milan 1-1 Slavia Praha, Borussia Dortmund 0-0 Barcelona.
Matchday 2: Slavia Praha 0-2 Borussia Dortmund, Barcelona 2-1 Inter Milan.
Matchday 3: Slavia Praha 1-2 Barcelona, Inter Milan 2-0 Borussia Dortmund.
Matchday 5 (27 November 2019): Slavia Praha vs Inter Milan, Barcelona vs Borussia Dortmund.
Sebelum ini, Inter dan Dortmund sudah saling berhadapan 4 kali. Mereka pertama bertemu di semifinal European Champions Clubs' Cup 1964, kemudian di perempat final UEFA Cup 1993/94. Pada 1964, Inter menang agregat 4-2 (2-2 tandang, 2-0 kandang). Pada 1994, Inter menang agregat 4-3 (3-1 tandang, 1-2 kandang).
Scroll terus ke bawah untuk statistik yang lebih lengkap.
text:
Champions League Data and Facts: Borussia Dortmund vs Inter Milan
Nov 04 2019, 16:17 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Borussia Dortmund will host Inter Milan on Matchday 4 Group F Champions League 2019/20, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Here are some data and facts that formed the background of this match at Signal Iduna Park.
On Matchday 3, Dortmund surrendered 0-2 at Inter headquarters. Inter goals scored by Lautaro Martinez 22 minutes and Antonio Candreva 89 minutes.
Inter and Dortmund currently both have 4 points, 3 points behind Barcelona (7) and 3 points ahead of Slavia Prague (1).
Matchday 1: Inter Milan 1-1 Slavia Prague, Borussia Dortmund 0-0 Barcelona.
Matchday 2: Slavic Prague 0-2 Borussia Dortmund, Barcelona 2-1 Inter Milan.
Matchday 3: Slavia Prague 1-2 Barcelona, Inter Milan 2-0 Borussia Dortmund.
Matchday 5 (27 November 2019): Slavia Prague vs. Inter Milan, Barcelona vs Borussia Dortmund.
Before this, Inter and Dortmund have faced each other 4 times. They first met in the 1964 European Champions Clubs' semifinals, then in the 1993/94 UEFA Cup quarter-finals. In 1964, Inter won 4-2 on aggregate (2-2 away, 2-0 home). In 1994, Inter won 4-3 on aggregate (3-1 away, 1-2 home).
Scroll down for more complete statistics.
